    • addEmployee

      public java.lang.String addEmployee​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String id, double salary, int experience, int numTeams, java.lang.String team, int numChampionships, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> championships)
      This method creates a new employee with its features, and adds it to the ArrayList of employees.
      name: addEmployee.
      pre: the variables name, id, salary, experience, numTeams, team, numChampionships, and the ArrayList of championships are already inicializated.
      post: the employee was hired successfully or the employee couldn't be hired.
      Parameters:
      name - is a String variable that contains the name of a main coach.
      id - is a String variable that contains the ID of a main coach.
      salary - is a double variable that contains the salary of a main coach.
      experience - is an integer variable that contains the main coach's number years of experience.
      numTeams - is an integer variable that contains the number of teams that a main coach has been in charge during his career.
      team - is a String variable that contains the name of a team.
      numChampionships - is an integer variable that contains the number of championships that a main coach has achieved during his career.
      championships - is an ArrayList of Strings that contains the names of all the championships that a main coach has achieved during his career.
      Returns:
      String message that is a variable with a notice for the user.

    • addEmployee

      public java.lang.String addEmployee​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String id, double salary, int experience, int profession, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> expertises, java.lang.String team)
      This method creates a new employee with its features, and adds it to the ArrayList of employees.
      name: addEmployee.
      pre: the variables name, id, salary, experience, profession, team, and the ArrayList of expertises are already inicializated.
      post: the employee was hired successfully or the employee couldn't be hired.
      Parameters:
      name - is a String variable that contains the name of an assistant coach.
      id - is a String variable that contains the ID of an assistant coach.
      salary - is a double variable that contains the salary of an assistant coach.
      experience - is an integer variable that contains the assistant coach's number years of experience.
      profession - is an integer variable that represents if the assistant coach has ever been a professional player or not.
      expertises - is an ArrayList of integers that represents the expertises of an assistant coach.
      team - is a String variable that contains the name of a team.
      Returns:
      String message that is a variable with a notice for the user.

    • addLineupToTeam

      public java.lang.String addLineupToTeam​(java.lang.String nameTeam, java.lang.String date, int tactic, int defenses, int midfielders, int forwards)
      This method adds a lineup to a specific team.
      name: addLineupToTeam.
      pre: the variables such as nameTeam, date, tactic, defenses, midfielders and forwards are already inicializated.
      post: the lineup of a team was added successfully to a team or not.
      Parameters:
      nameTeam - is a String variable that contains the name of a team.
      date - is a String variable that contains the date when a lineup was implemented by a team.
      tactic - is a integer variable that represents the tactic that is used in a lineup.
      defenses - is a integer variable that contains the number of players that are going to be in the line of defense at the formation.
      midfielders - is a integer variable that contains the number of players that are going to be in the line of midfielders at the formation.
      forwards - is a integer variable that contains the number of players that are going to be in the line of forwards at the formation.
      Returns:
      String message that is a variable with a notice for the user.
